alert.note: Alert for Estill; Powell (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 06 at 7:48PM EDT until August 09 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Kentucky... Red River at Clay City affecting Powell and Estill Counties. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Red River at Clay City. * WHEN...From this evening to Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Low lying areas flood. Maple street near the Red River Ranch as well as Pompeii Road off of Highway 15 are impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 PM EDT Saturday the stage was 13.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 16.8 feet by early Monday. - Action stage is 13.0 feet. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. The next statement will be issued by 11 PM.
